titleStmt.title: A treatise tending to unitie in a sermon preached at Droghedah on Whitsunday (being the ninth of Iune 1622.) before the Kings Majesties Commissioners for Ireland. By Henry Leslie.
titleStmt.author: Leslie, Henry, 1580-1661.
